title: Level 1: Symmetry Detection
description:
Welcome to the Nordic Snowflake Research Lab in Kiruna, Sweden! You're analyzing your first snowflake sample.

Snowflakes have 6-fold rotational symmetry. A simple way to represent a snowflake is as a string where each character represents one of the 6 arms.

This snowflake pattern: {{input}}

Is this snowflake symmetric? (All arms identical)
Answer 'yes' or 'no'.
hint: Check if all 6 characters in the string are the same. A perfectly symmetric snowflake has identical arms.
